name: The Oberoi Gurgaon
shortDescription: Experience contemporary sophistication at The Oberoi Gurgaon, a stunning modern resort in Delhi NCR offering landscaped gardens, world-class cuisine, and legendary Oberoi service for elegant celebrations.
longDescription:
The Oberoi Gurgaon represents contemporary luxury at its finest—a modern resort that creates an oasis of calm within India's most dynamic corporate hub. Set amid nine acres of landscaped gardens with water features, mature trees, and thoughtfully designed outdoor spaces, this property offers couples seeking Delhi NCR weddings a venue that combines Oberoi's legendary service with sophisticated modern aesthetics and extensive green spaces unusual in urban settings.

The hotel's design embraces contemporary elegance with clean lines, natural materials, and seamless integration of indoor and outdoor spaces. Floor-to-ceiling windows bring the landscaped gardens into every public area. Art installations by celebrated Indian artists punctuate the spaces. The overall aesthetic appeals to design-conscious couples seeking modern sophistication.

With 202 rooms and suites, The Oberoi Gurgaon accommodates substantial wedding parties while maintaining the personalized service that defines the brand. The suites offer generous living spaces for bridal preparation. The Kohinoor Suite provides the ultimate wedding couple retreat with its expansive layout and private outdoor spaces.

Wedding venues include the beautiful outdoor gardens capable of hosting 400 guests, the elegant ballroom for climate-controlled celebrations, and multiple smaller venues for intimate gatherings. The ability to host different events in different spaces allows complete multi-day weddings to flow seamlessly across the property.

Culinary experiences at The Oberoi Gurgaon span multiple award-winning restaurants including Threesixtyone for international cuisine, Amaranta for coastal Indian fare, and specialty options. The wedding culinary team creates menus that match any vision.
weatherNote: Delhi NCR enjoys pleasant weather October-March (8°C-28°C). Summer (April-June) is extremely hot. Monsoon (July-September) brings humidity.

alcoholPolicy: Full bar services with premium offerings. Haryana alcohol regulations apply. Custom bar programs available.
decorPolicy: Preferred decorators familiar with the property. External decorators coordinate through events team. Contemporary aesthetics encouraged.
musicPolicy: Outdoor music until 10:00 PM per regulations. Ballroom offers flexibility. Professional sound systems available.
cancellationPolicy: Cancellations 90+ days: 25% forfeited. 60-89 days: 50% forfeited. Less than 60 days: 100% forfeited.
paymentTerms: 30% advance at booking. 40% due 60 days before. Balance 30% due 14 days before.

drivingDirections.fromAirport: From IGI Airport, take NH48 towards Gurgaon. Exit at Udyog Vihar and follow signs to The Oberoi. Journey time approximately 25 minutes.
drivingDirections.fromDelhi: From central Delhi, take NH48 south to Gurgaon. Navigate to Udyog Vihar Phase V. Journey time approximately 45 minutes depending on traffic.

faqs.question: How close is the airport?
faqs.answer: Just 25 minutes from IGI Airport, making it convenient for guests arriving from across India and internationally.

faqs.question: What makes this different from Delhi hotels?
faqs.answer: The 9-acre garden setting creates a resort atmosphere unusual in urban locations. The outdoor space and greenery distinguish it from city hotels.
